Detailed Description

Common enums and utilities for protocol field names and flags.

Provides:

  • proto::FieldName — enumeration of standard field identifiers;
  • proto::ToString — conversion of enum to string;
  • proto::FieldFlags — bitwise flags describing field properties;
  • bitwise operators for proto::FieldFlags and stream output.
